Once the design is complete, KI will manage your construction project from start to finish. Keeping costs down, quality up and the schedule on track.

KI will supply an experienced Project Lead that will attend weekly site meetings, review the schedule, and perform field progress updates to ensure that the project is on-track; keeping our clients up-to-date.
